this_title: Sous le silence et la terre
introduction: The filmmaker, named after her aunt who disappeared in the 1980s, touches on a family wound that has never healed. She embarks on a journey to Colombia, her parents' country of origin, in search of the physical remains of the mysterious fighter of the armed struggle. In the course of her quest, Gisela manages to draw an intimate portrait of this emblematic woman, whom she has not been able to get to know. The film breaks the silence imposed by the distress of those who are prevented from burying their dead.
chinese_title: Sous le silence et la terre
